title.$value: Learn to Create Your Own 2D Video Game with Unity: Step-by-Step Guide

p1.$value: In this course, you will learn how to create your own 2D video game from scratch using Unity. You will start with an introduction to the software, learning how to install it, get familiar with the interface, and create your first project. Then, you will discover Unity's key tools, such as handling animations, basic programming for control interactions, and implementing components like Rigidbody 2D and Collider 2D to add gravity and movement to the character.

p2.$value: As you progress, you will learn how to create 2D environments with Tilemap, design user interfaces, and develop start and Game Over menus. Finally, you will fine-tune additional details such as the camera that follows the character, add sounds and special effects, and optimize your game for export and play, leaving your project ready to be shared.

description.$value: No prior experience is required. The course covers everything from the basics of Unity and C# programming to advanced 2D development techniques.
